price: (7) So whoever does an atom's weight[1965] of good will see it,
arabic: فَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيۡرٗا يَرَهُۥ
footnotes: [1965]- Or "the weight of a small ant."

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: faman yaʿmal mith'qāla dharratin khayran yarahu
